<id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20210205014443/https://meanderful.blogspot.com/2018 /01/the-accidental-hft-firm.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T09:54:59.808207Z</更新>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/ 20210205014443/https://meanderful.blogspot.com/2018/01/the-accidental-hft-firm.html"/>; <author>; <name>;Twixes</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=Twixes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://web.archive.org/web/20210205014444im_/https://2.bp. blogspot.com/-IvTrVTjUluA/WxvzieGw3oI/AAAAAAAAMSQ/Lz-dTYA9ahIdRdvSWfADXAaacdO11ehXwCLcBGAs/s320/DUO2qqwVwAIBXda.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;这篇文章是作者在高频交易方面的个人经历，包括为期权交易开发定价缓存和创建一个系统来应对 2 毫秒延迟挑战。作者还讨论了与困难的团队成员一起工作的挑战和行业政治。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-accidental-hft-firm-2018" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36269041" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Zig 语言服务器和取消</stitle>; <id>;https://matklad.github.io/2023 /05/06/zig-language-server-and-cancellation.html</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T06:54:59.808864Z</更新>; <link href="https://matklad.github. io/2023/05/06/zig-language-server-and-cancellation.html"/>; <author>; <name>;goranmoomin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= goranmoomin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://matklad.github.io/assets/zig-lsp.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 105px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了在为语言实现 LSP 时从可靠的数据模型开始的重要性，并探讨了在语言服务器中处理取消的不同方法。作者建议使用半空间垃圾收集方法来处理现在需要但将来不需要的内存。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#zig-language-server-and-cancellation" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268247" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Debian 12 “书呆子”</stitle>; <id>;https://www.debian.org /News/2023/20230610</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T12:54:59.809369Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.debian.org/News/2023/20230610"/>; <author>; <name>;Chatting</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Chatting</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Debian 发布了其新的经过 1 年 9 个月 28 天的开发，稳定版 12，名为“书虫”。该版本包括 11,000 多个新软件包、更新的软件包以及对 ARM64 上安全启动的支持。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#debian-12-bookworm" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36269934" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;腮腺炎病例 (2007)</stitle>; <id>;https://thedailywtf.com/articles/A_Case_of_the_MUMPS</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T09:54:59.809860Z </updated>; <link href="https://thedailywtf.com/articles/A_Case_of_the_MUMPS"/>; <author>; <name>;ahiknsr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =ahiknsr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thedailywtf.com/images/alexp/apx-square500.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度： 220 像素；" />;<br />;Bryan H 在“MUMPS 商店”工作了两年多，在那里他必须学习和使用 MUMPS 编程语言。 MUMPS 是一种用于创建和维护医疗信息系统的编程语言，其语法难以使用，其设计目标是创建永远无法再由任何人维护的代码。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-case-of-the-mumps-2007" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268931" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;许可对于解决人工智能风险既不可行也无效</stitle>; <id>;https://aisnakeoil.substack.com/p/licensing-is-neither-feasible-也不</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T13:31:59.810246Z</更新>; <link href="https://aisnakeoil.substack.com/p/licensing-is-neither-feasible-nor"/ >; <author>; <name>;headalgorithm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=headalgorithm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1200,h_600,c_fill,f_jpg,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep,g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic %2Fimages%2F4239d7c6-4f55-4254-91f2-20b9b2bec77e_1118x639.jpeg" style="宽度：220px；高度：119px；" />;<br />;许多人和组织认为，使人工智能更安全的一种方法是通过不扩散，类似于核武器或人类克隆。这意味着只有某些获得许可的公司和组织才能构建最先进的人工智能模型。争论的焦点是，这将使政府能够遏制有害人工智能模型的传播，监督人工智能工具的构建及其部署方式，从而能够以对社会有益的方式指导人工智能的发展。类似的论点是其他阻止 AI 发展的尝试的基础，例如，在生命未来研究所的信中主张暂停六个月的训练模型大于 GPT-4。如果监管机构承诺不扩散，他们将如何执行？仅仅要求开发人员获得许可是不够的，因为恶意行为者可以简单地忽略许可要求并继续训练 AI 模型。建议的一种方法是监视训练和托管模型的数据中心。该提议依赖于人工智能需要大量计算资源这一事实。理论上，当客户使用超过一定水平的计算资源时，数据中心需要报告，这可能会引发调查。但随着算法和硬件的改进降低了在给定能力水平下训练模型的成本，这种方法将需要越来越严厉的监视措施和前所未有的国际合作水平才能有效。尽管训练像 GPT-4 这样的最先进模型很昂贵，但成本正在迅速下降，这既是因为硬件成本的降低，也是因为用于训练 AI 模型的算法的改进。要看到长期趋势，我们可以看看计算机视觉。从 2012 年到 2019 年，训练具有相同性能的图像识别分类器的成本降低了 44 倍。在撰写本文时，功能最强大的开源语言模型之一 Falcon 只需要不到 400 个 GPU，而且训练时间仅需两个月。我们估计可以用不到 100 万美元的成本来训练这样的模型。此外，构建大型语言模型所需的技术诀窍已经很普遍，并且有几个组织开发的开源 LLM 共享他们的整个代码和培训方法。由于这些原因，从执法的角度来看，防扩散是行不通的。 OpenAI 和其他人提出，只有超过特定训练计算阈值的最强大的模型才需要许可证。也许这更可行——但同样，除非所有有能力的行为者自愿遵守，否则只有赋予政府非凡的权力才能强制执行。让我们弄清楚它能完成什么：它最多只能争取几年的时间。对于任何给定的能力阈值，由于硬件和算法的改进，训练成本可能会持续下降。一旦成本足够低，能够为此类模型的开发提供资金的参与者数量将太高而无法监管。尽管 AI 模型本身在激增，但少数大型科技公司仍能从生成 AI 浪潮中获利：无论是通过将其集成到他们的应用程序中（例如，谷歌、微软和苹果），还是通过出售 API 访问权限（例如， OpenAI 和 Anthropic），或者通过销售硬件（NVIDIA）。这种集中会损害竞争。致力于不扩散会进一步增加这种风险，因为只有少数公司能够开发出最先进的人工智能。此外，信息安全领域数十年的经验表明，公开应对安全风险比“隐瞒安全”更好。特别是，不扩散和由此产生的权力集中将影响五个主要的 AI 风险： 单一文化可能会加剧安全风险。当成千上万的应用程序都由同一个模型提供支持时（GPT-3.5 今天已经处于这个位置），可以在所有这些不同的应用程序中利用该模型中的安全漏洞。单一栽培可能导致结果同质化。在不同的应用程序中使用相同的 AI 模型会增加同质化，包括在简历筛选等相关设置中。如果一个候选人申请了多项工作，而不是由不同的公司独立评估，如果所有公司都使用相同的人工智能工具进行招聘，他们可能会被所有公司拒绝。界定可接受言论的界限。在某些方面，生成式 AI 应用程序类似于人们生成和消费内容的社交媒体平台。如果大多数人使用由一小群提供者创建的模型，这些开发人员通过管理对话中允许和不允许的内容，在定义可接受语音的 Overton 窗口方面获得了巨大的权力。影响态度和意见。如果人们使用聊天机器人作为对话伙伴，他们表达的“意见”可能会大规模影响人们的观点。最近的一项研究证明了这一点。监管抓捕。正在进行的许可制度游说可以被视为监管俘获。如果成功，它将赋予人工智能公司在政策辩论中更大的权力。他们可以将批评者斥为缺乏 AI 能力和风险专业知识的不知情的局外人，而不是参与争论。避免集中的一种方法是由各种学术界、公司和非政府组织开发和评估最先进的模型。我们相信这将是发现和解决人工智能风险的更好方法。当然，开源 AI 有其自身的风险，需要护栏。这些护栏可能是什么样子的？我们计划很快分享一些想法。 1 该模型在 384 个 Nvidia A100 GPU 上训练了 60 天。在 AWS 上使用一个这样的 GPU 的每小时费用从 1.44 美元到 4.10 美元不等。批量成本通常低于每小时成本。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#licensing-is-neither-feasible-nor-effective-for-addressing-ai-risks" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;表情符号厨房</stitle>; <id>;https:// emojikitchen.dev/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T03:54:59.810669Z</updated>; <link href="https://emojikitchen.dev/"/>; <作者>; <name>;smollett</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=smollett</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://emojikitchen.dev/social .png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;组合表情符号的独特插图，在 Google 的 Emoji Kitchen 中制作，并在网络上全面提供 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#emoji-kitchen" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36267382" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;计算机图形行业起步于犹他大学</stitle>; <id>;https: //spectrum.ieee.org/history-of-computer-graphics-industry</id>; <更新>;2023-06-09T22:54:59.811057Z</更新>; <link href="https://spectrum.ieee .org/history-of-computer-graphics-industry"/>; <author>; <name>;sohkamyung</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sohkamyung</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-large-group-of-older-men-standing-for-a-group-portrait -some-sitting-on-chairs-in-front-and-others-standing-behind-them.jpg?id=34017358&width=1200&height=900" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;犹他大学通过 David Evans 和 Ivan E. Sutherland 在 1960 年代和 70 年代的开创性研究，在启动计算机图形行业方面发挥了重要作用。今天的许多计算机图形名人最初是在他们的公司 Evans and Sutherland 担任员工或博士生，在那里他们为计算机图形处理做出了基础性贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-computer-graphics- industry-got-started-at-the-university-of-utah" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36264744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;飞机失事后 40 天，亚马逊发现四名儿童还活着</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bbc.com/news/world-latin-america-65864158</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T12 :54:59.811458Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.bbc.com/news/world-latin-america-65864158"/>; <author>; <name>;sjcsjc</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sjcsjc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://ichef.bbci.co.uk/news/ 1024/branded_news/F31B/production/_130053226_4a94e355e06c9c99bb2f0c658192f6bbae2deb5a.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;四名年龄分别为 13 岁、9 岁、4 岁和 1 岁的儿童在飞机失事中幸存下来，他们的母亲和两名飞行员在哥伦比亚的亚马逊丛林中被发现。这些孩子属于到 Huitoto 土著群体，失踪了 40 天，然后被士兵和当地人参与的大规模搜索行动救出。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#four-children-found-alive-in -amazon-40-days-after-plane-crash" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36270011" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示HN : 用 600 行 C89 编写的 RISC-V 内核</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/mnurzia/rv</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T13:09:59.811850Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/mnurzia/rv"/>; <作者>; <name>;mnurzia</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mnurzia</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/eb7467b4be3801cb2f9f9bb2033d5e13b4c9af9132b5353db8668fab64342a17/mnurzia/rv" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;转储从 0x80000000 开始的二进制文件，可以由 rv 直接加载，如上例所示：不使用任何大于 32 位的整数类型，即使是乘法，因为它是用 C89 编写的。以一种不完全符合 C89/99 的方式假设整数类型的宽度。很快就会修复这个问题，我正在研究一个防水的 <stdint. h>; 用于 C89。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-risc-v-core-written-in-600-lines-of-c89" target="_blank">;[ summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;毛基辛格会议1973</stitle>; <id>;https://gaodawei.wordpress.com/2023/06/08/1973-prc-notes-on-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-february-17-1973/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-09T23:54:59.812239Z</更新>; <link href="https://gaodawei.wordpress.com/2023/06/08/1973-prc-notes-on-mao-kissinger- meeting-of-february-17-1973/"/>; <author>; <name>;prude</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prude</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gaodawei.files.wordpress.com/2023/06/snap493.jpg?w=1005" style="width: 220px; height: 133px;" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了解密的外交关系文件在提供历史事件见解方面的重要性，特别关注 1973 年的毛基辛格会议。作者比较了美国和中国的旁注会议并记录了一些差异，包括毛主席的政治不正确笑话。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-mao-kissinger-meeting-of-1973" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265771" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我的 Chrome 扩展提交过程的经验</stitle>; <id>;https://meetingdolphin.com/blog /chrome-extension-submission</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T09:54:59.812596Z</updated>; <link href="https://meetingdolphin.com/blog/chrome-extension-submission"/>; <author>; <name>;lcmchris</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lcmchris</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://meetingdolphin.com/images/SnippetPermissions.png" style="width: 220px; height: 120px;" />;<br />;作者分享了他们在 Chrome 扩展程序提交过程中的经验，并将其与签证申请过程进行了比较。他们提供了有关如何导航该过程并告知用户潜在问题的提示和见解，例如自动更新和缺少回滚功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-experience-of-the-chrome-extension-submission-process" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36260906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;资本化的仪式 (2021)</stitle>; <id>;https://economicsfromthetopdown.com/ 2021/06/02/the-ritual-of-capitalization/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T07:54:59.812962Z</更新>; <link href="https://economicsfromthetopdown.com/2021/ 06/02/the-ritual-of-capitalization/"/>; <author>; <name>;benaadams</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=benaadams</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/economicsfromthetopdown.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/ritual_capitalization.png?resize=600%2C450&ssl=1 " style="宽度: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;金融是一种以资本化仪式为中心的量化信仰体系，将财产与金融混合，将其化为一个数字。资本化仪式是资本主义意识形态的体现，产生了人类行为的惊人规律。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ritual-of-capitalization-2021" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36267611" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;夜深人静，震耳欲聋的战争</stitle>; <id>;https://atmos.earth/exploring-evolution-of-bats-and -蛾/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T10:54:59.813311Z</更新>; <link href="https://atmos.earth/exploring-evolution-of-bats-and-moths/" />; <author>; <name>;meanie</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=meanie</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://atmos.earth/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/evolution-bats-moths-1280x853.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Aaron Corcoran 博士研究蝙蝠和飞蛾之间的战斗，包括回声定位、化学防御、声纳干扰、隐身追踪和声学幻觉。这种冲突已经持续了数百万年，双方都做出了显着的调整。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#in-the-dead-of-night-a-deafening-war" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265734" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Reddit 禁止 subreddit 详细说明如何转移到竞争对手 Kbin</stitle>; <id>;https://old.reddit .com/r/KbinMigration</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T07:54:59.813661Z</更新>; <link href="https://old.reddit.com/r/KbinMigration"/>; <作者>; <name>;ZacnyLos</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ZacnyLos</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //www.redditstatic.com/interstitial-image-banned.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;帮助每个人从 Reddit 迁移到 Kbin，让我们让下一次 Digg 外流发生，希望是最后一次。这是社区运行的，我们是... <a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#reddit-bans-subreddit-detailing-how-to-move-to-competitor-kbin" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:/ /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36268458" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一个学生想逃避考试的愿望导致了一种压缩算法</stitle>; <id>;https://www.quantamagazine.org/how-lossless-data -compression-works-20230531</id>; <updated>;2023-06-09T17:54:59.814017Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.quantamagazine.org/how-lossless-data-compression- works-20230531"/>; <author>; <name>;the-mitr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=the-mitr</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://d2r55xnwy6nx47.cloudfront.net/uploads/2023/05/CompressionExplainer-byKristinaArmitage-Lede-scaled.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;研究人员正在开发新的有损数据压缩技术，以减少每天通过互联网传输的 90 亿千兆字节信息的大小。然而，不牺牲任何实质内容的无损方法已经成为现实高效并为许多标准图像和软件实用程序提供支持。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-students-desire-to-get-out-of-a-exam-led-to-a -compression-algorithm" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36251471" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PlayHT (YC W23) 招聘高级 ML工程师（法学硕士/生成模型）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/playht/jobs/G6vI660-senior-ml-engineer-large-language-models</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-10T07:54:59.814393Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/playht/jobs/G6vI660-senior-ml-engineer-large-language-models"/ >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bookface-images.s3.amazonaws.com/small_logos/3d4c9619438357f2137d8fd295cf819f695c073d.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Play.ht (YC23) 正在构建未来的生成媒体平台；我们拥有业界最高质量的语音合成和语音克隆模型。我们正在寻找全-时间高级机器学习工程师加入我们建立平台，使数百万创作者能够使用生成 AI 来创建各种类型的内容。完美的候选人是一个可靠的自主工程师，在大型语言模型、生成模型方面具有成长心态和经验和变形金刚。最好是语音合成、GPT 和扩散模型知识。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#playht-yc-w23-is-hiring-a-senior-ml-engineer- llms-generative-models" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;LLM 比你想象的更擅长玩你</stitle>; <id>;https://lcamt​​uf.substack.com/p/llms-are-better-than-you-think-at</ id>; <更新>;2023-06-09T23:54:59.814704Z</更新>; <link href="https://lcamt​​uf.substack.com/p/llms-are-better-than-you-think-at" />; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages% 2F69d6f93e-c449-405d-8bef-d3e8790edef0_1740x1333.png" style="width: 220px; height: 169px;" />;<br />;大型语言模型 (LLM) 非常先进且与人类相似，但它们的智能仅限于它们收到的训练数据以及它们通过强化学习和人类反馈编程给出的响应(RLHF)。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llms-are-better-than-you-think-at-playing-you" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265658" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用代码建立品牌标识</stitle>; <id>;https://zchry.org/words/building-a-带代码的品牌标识</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T06:54:59.815055Z</更新>; <link href="https://zchry.org/words/building-a-brand-identity -with-code"/>; <author>; <name>;oldstrangers</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=oldstrangers</uri>; </author>; <content type="html ">;<img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6398b11ee9bf53ef62055173/646e610583d94c151e25bd72_Frame%203%20(4).svg" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;作者创建了一个 Figma 插件来为品牌项目绘制利萨如曲线。该插件允许用户调整频率和相移等参数，以创建不同形状和大小的曲线。< a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-a-brand-identity-with-code" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36250179" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;我不讨厌</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.thefrenchghosty.me/posts/im-not-invidious/</id>; <更新>;2023 -06-10T01:54:59.815406Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.thefrenchghosty.me/posts/im-not-invidious/"/>; <author>; <name>;worldofmatthew</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=worldofmatthew</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Invidious 收到了一封来自 Google/YouTube 的电子邮件，要求他们停止他们的项目，但是该电子邮件无效，因为 Invidious 没有使用 YouTube API 的任何部分，也没有做任何违法的事情。 Invidious 不属于作者所有并且是开源的，因此任何人都可以为它做出贡献。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#im-not-invidious" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36262722" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;1970 年代的校园图书馆员预见了我们的分布式知识和研究世界</stitle>; <id>;https://aeon.co/essays/the-1970s-librarians-who-revolutionised-the-challenge-of -搜索</id>; <更新>;2023-06-09T22:54:59.815751Z</更新>; <link href="https://aeon.co/essays/the-1970s-librarians-who-revolutionised-the-搜索挑战”/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;<img src="https://d2e1bqvws99ptg.cloudfront.net/user_image_upload/2502/Insert-IBM-360.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：159px；" />;<br />;在 1970 年代，锡拉丘兹大学进行了一项名为 SUPARS 的在线搜索实验，参与者使用基于计算机的信息检索系统来搜索心理学摘要。尽管遇到了技术困难和挫折，但参与者发现该系统既有趣又令人兴奋，而且 SUPARS 预示了当代网络搜索协议的几个主要特征。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#1970s-campus-librarians-foresaw-our-world-of-distributed-knowledge-and-research" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36252501" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;入职反模式</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dcaulfield.com/onboarding-antipatterns</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T09:54:59.816094Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dcaulfield.com/onboarding-antipatterns"/>; <author>; <name>;cauliflower99</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cauliflower99</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文章讨论了良好的入职体验对新员工的重要性，并提供了反模式示例避免。它强调需要明确的说明、实际任务和明确的目标，以确保成功的入职流程。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#onboarding-antipatterns" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36259679" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;为了拯救 C，我们必须拯救 ABI (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://thephd.dev/to-save-c-we-must-save-abi-fixing-c-function -abi</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T10:54:59.816444Z</更新>; <link href="https://thephd.dev/to-save-c-we-must-save-abi- fixing-c-function-abi"/>; <author>; <name>;karsinkk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=karsinkk</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://thephd.dev/assets/img/2022/03/Jason%20Turner%20(lefticus)%20-%20C++%20Weekly%20270%20-%20Title%20Screen .png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;一些平台已经实现了应用程序二进制接口（abi）的稳定性。这背后的想法是允许不同的实现和实现策略来完成某些工作。如果我们将 dll 从代码下换出，尽管有中断，它仍会继续工作——即使启用了优化并且没有堆栈保护。未来会重写abi稳定性机制，使其更容易在其他平台上实现。但现在，我们<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#to-save-c-we-must-save-abi-2022" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36249253" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;国际民航组织公钥目录</stitle>; <id>;https://www.icao.int:443/Security/ FAL/PKD/Pages/default.aspx</id>; <更新>;2023-06-10T02:54:59.816817Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.icao.int:443/Security/FAL /PKD/Pages/default.aspx"/>; <author>; <name>;kaladin-jasnah</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kaladin-jasnah</uri>; </ author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.icao.int:443/Security/FAL/PKD/PublishingImages/Pages/default/MapChart_Map%20%282%29a.png" style ="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;The ICAO Public Key Directory (PKD) is a central repository for exchanging information to authenticate electronic Machine Readable Travel Documents (eMRTDs) such as ePassports. The PKD provides an efficient means for States to upload their own information and download that of other States, ensuring information adheres to technical standards required for interoperability. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#international-civil-aviation-organization-public-key-directory" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36266656" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Buy well, buy once</stitle>; <id>;https://fellow.ventures/buy-well-buy-once/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T00:54:59.817168Z</updated>; <link href="https://fellow.ventures/buy-well-buy-once/"/>; <author>; <name>;revorad</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=revorad</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://fellow.ventures/media/posts/116/FiorentiniBaker.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 193px;" />;<br />;The author discusses their intentional approach to owning possessions and the importance of buying quality items that last. They share a story of upcycling their old leather shoes and the value of relationships and connections in business. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#buy-well-buy-once" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36256517" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Turkish citizens' personal data offered online after government site hacked</stitle>; <id>;https://balkaninsight.com/2023/06/09/turkish-citizens-personal-data-offered-online-after-govt-site-hacked/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-09T17:54:59.817513Z</updated>; <link href="https://balkaninsight.com/2023/06/09/turkish-citizens-personal-data-offered-online-after-govt-site-hacked/"/>; <author>; <name>;giuliomagnifico</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=giuliomagnifico</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://balkaninsight.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/sajad-nori-21mJd5NUGZU-unsplash.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;A website called sorgupaneli.org is offering personal data about Turkish citizens, including President Erdogan, that appears to have been stolen by hackers from a government services website. The hacked information includes ID numbers, phone numbers, and information about people's family members, with more sensitive information available for a paid premium membership. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#turkish-citizens-personal-data-offered-online-after-government-site-hacked" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36261411" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Cosmic luck: NASA's Apollo 11 moon quarantine broke down</stitle>; <id>;https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/09/science/nasa-moon-quarantine.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T01:54:59.817859Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.nytimes.com/2023/06/09/science/nasa-moon-quarantine.html"/>; <author>; <name>;Hooke</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hooke</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static01.nyt.com/images/2023/06/09/multimedia/09sci-quarantine-01-gzbk/09sci-quarantine-01-gzbk-articleLarge.jpg?quality=75&auto=webp&disable=upscale" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;NASA's quarantine protocol for the Apollo 11 mission was inadequate and oversold, according to a paper published in the science history journal Isis. The agency knew that lunar germs could pose an existential threat, but downplayed the risk and oversold their ability to neutralize it. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cosmic-luck-nasas-apollo-11-moon-quarantine-broke-down" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36266360" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;A comment about Christian Queinnec's book Lisp in Small Pieces (1996)</stitle>; <id>;https://pages.lip6.fr/Christian.Queinnec/WWW/newsAboutLiSP.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T02:54:59.818204Z</updated>; <link href="https://pages.lip6.fr/Christian.Queinnec/WWW/newsAboutLiSP.html"/>; <author>; <name>;vector_spaces</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vector_spaces</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;The article is a review of Christian Queinnec's book Lisp in Small Pieces, which is a useful resource for designers of interpreters and compilers. The book is thorough and authoritative, but may be difficult for beginners to follow. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-comment-about-christian-queinnec-s-book-lisp-in-small-pieces-1996" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36267083" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;All Those Naked Greeks</stitle>; <id>;https://aeon.co/essays/why-are-men-seemingly-always-naked-in-ancient-greek-art</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T00:54:59.818554Z</updated>; <link href="https://aeon.co/essays/why-are-men-seemingly-always-naked-in-ancient-greek-art"/>; <author>; <name>;diodorus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=diodorus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d2e1bqvws99ptg.cloudfront.net/user_image_upload/2493/insert-fig-1-foundry-painter-974372_4000x4000.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 175px;" />;<br />;The article discusses the prevalence and various meanings of male nudity in ancient Greek art, including the convention of depicting heroic and athletic males in a state of undress, the use of nudity as a symbol of power and erotic desire, and the real-life practice of civic nudity in which only certain citizens were able to participate in nude athletic activity. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-those-naked-greeks" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36266342" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Microsoft Edge removes ability to delete Sync Data from Cloud</stitle>; <id>;https://techdows.com/2023/06/microsoft-edge-removes-reset-sync.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-10T02:54:59.818910Z</updated>; <link href="https://techdows.com/2023/06/microsoft-edge-removes-reset-sync.html"/>; <author>; <name>;fernvenue</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fernvenue</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techdows.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Microsoft-Edges-Previous-Reset-Sync-option.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 141px;" />;<br />;Microsoft Edge version 114 no longer has a "reset sync" button to delete data from Microsoft Servers, instead it has been replaced with a "Re-sync now" option. This means there is no way to remove browsing data from Microsoft's cloud. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#microsoft-edge-removes-ability-to-delete-sync-data-from-cloud" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36267087" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Edmund Burke was a more complicated thinker than realized</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newstatesman.com/ideas/2023/06/influence-edmund-burke-national-conservatism-intellectual-jewish</id>; <updated>;2023-06-09T23:54:59.819271Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.newstatesman.com/ideas/2023/06/influence-edmund-burke-national-conservatism-intellectual-jewish"/>; <author>; <name>;commons-tragedy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=commons-tragedy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://dl6pgk4f88hky.cloudfront.net/2023/06/01/NatCon_154x140mm_BarbaraGibson-1038x778.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;The Edmund Burke Foundation, a Washington-based think tank launched by Israeli conservative thinker Yoram Hazony in 2019, claims that the true Burke belongs with the National Conservatives, a new movement that unites advocates of religious values, free markets, and ethno-nationalism around the world. However, Burke was a more complicated thinker than Tories like to think, with both progressive and reactionary views. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#edmund-burke-was-a-more-complicated-thinker-than-realized" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36265685" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
